name: 范政揆
objective:
1. 體認永續在設計之重要性
2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用
3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳
4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.
